channel.title: Need help getting my download client public. WILL GIVE REP++ FOR STEP BY STEP
channel.description: Where do I edit in my client files to put my server online for others to play? I want to be able to upload it to uppit and have others play it... what do I change? I'm already portforwarded, everything is set, I have a no-ip online, I just need to know where to insert my no-ip URL and how to make the server public for a download client. I need to know what to change in what files in order to put it online so if I upload the client to uppit.com and tell my friend about it, he can download it and also play it. Someone please help me with this step by step?

item.title: Need help getting my download client public. WILL GIVE REP++ FOR STEP BY STEP
item.dc:creator: @homerunhitta977 homerunhitta977
item.description:
@homerunhitta977 wrote:

Is that all you need to edit in order to put it online?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my download client public. WILL GIVE REP++ FOR STEP BY STEP

item.title: Need help getting my download client public. WILL GIVE REP++ FOR STEP BY STEP
item.dc:creator: @escalation escalation
item.description:
@escalation wrote:

  1. You cannot rep.
  2. Find your client.java and edit it in there.
    The IP should be 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 just edit those.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help getting my download client public. WILL GIVE REP++ FOR STEP BY STEP
